amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert a complete new text detailing use of funding for an FHA Refinancing Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 15 printed in the Congressional Record to insert a complete new text detailing use of funding for an FHA Refinancing Program.

action.text: Amendment (A007) in the nature of a substitute offered by Ms. Sanchez, Loretta.

Mrs. Biggert raised a point of order against the Sanchez, Loretta amendment (A007). Mrs. Biggert stated that the amendment had the effect of increasing mandatory spending over a specified period of time and violated clause 10 of rule 21. The Chair sustained the point of order.
